item.title: 在备忘录股票大涨帮助推迟退市风险之后，Opendoor 推迟了股东投票
item.description: 在最近公司股价上涨之后，由房屋炒家变身为 "备忘录股 "的Opendoor Technologies Inc.将推迟就反向股票拆分进行股东投票。【原文：Opendoor Technologies Inc., the home-flipper turned meme stock, is postponing a shareholder vote on a reverse stock split following the recent run-up in the company’s shares.】

item.title: 印度军方称三名武装分子在克什米尔枪战中丧生
item.description: 周一，印度武装部队在克什米尔动荡地区的枪战中击毙了三名武装分子嫌疑人，与此同时，立法者们正在就一起致命恐怖袭击后与邻国巴基斯坦的军事冲突展开辩论。【原文：India’s armed forces gunned down three suspected militants in a gunfight in the restive Kashmir region on Monday, while lawmakers debated the military conflict with neighboring Pakistan following a deadly terror attack.】

item.title: 顶级预测师认为加拿大降息将抑制伦尼升势
item.description: 根据第二季度加拿大货币最准确的预测，今年加拿大卢比对美国卢比将进一步走强，但其涨幅将受到央行降息的限制。【原文：Canada’s loonie will strengthen further against its US counterpart this year but its rise will be limited by the central bank’s interest-rate cuts, according to the currency’s most accurate forecaster in the second quarter.】

item.title: 欧佩克+再次呼吁在做出供应决定前严守配额纪律
item.description: 欧佩克+委员会再次敦促成员国遵守石油配额，因为他们正准备权衡再次增产的可能性。【原文：An OPEC+ committee once again urged members to adhere to oil quotas as they prepare to weigh another production increase.】

item.title: 在数据和盈利狂潮来临前达成脱欧协议，S&P 500 指数上涨
item.description: 美国股市周一继续攀升，原因是周末与欧盟达成的贸易协议助长了市场的乐观情绪，本周将有大型科技公司的财报、经济数据和美联储会议。【原文：US equities extended their climb on Monday as a weekend trade deal with the European Union fueled optimism ahead of a jam-packed week of earnings scorecards from Big Tech, economic data and a Federal Reserve meeting.】

item.title: 华尔街正在改写比特币交易规则
item.description: 华尔街正在控制比特币的重心。【原文：Wall Street is seizing control of Bitcoin’s center of gravity.】

item.title: SMBC 计划将 SRT 与向私人基金提供的 80 亿美元贷款挂钩
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，三井住友银行（Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp.【原文：Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp. is sounding out investors for a significant risk transfer tied to a portfolio of loans to private market funds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贝宝将为商户推出 "使用加密货币支付 "功能
item.description: PayPal Holdings Inc. 很快将允许企业在结账时接受一百多种加密货币。【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc. will soon allow businesses to accept more than one hundred cryptocurrencies at checkout.】

item.title: 墨西哥寻求利用债务市场为墨西哥石油公司提供支持
item.description: 墨西哥启动发债计划，以支持陷入困境的国有石油公司墨西哥石油公司（Petroleos Mexicanos）。【原文：Mexico kicked off a debt offering to support beleaguered state-owned oil company Petroleos Mexicanos.】

item.title: 微软暂停向俄罗斯石油公司支持的印度炼油厂提供服务
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）在一份声明中表示，已停止向俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft）支持的印度炼油厂纳亚拉能源公司（Nayara Energy）提供服务。【原文：Microsoft Corp. has stopped providing services to Rosneft-backed Nayara Energy, the Indian oil refiner said in a statement, adding to challenges facing the company, which was recently hit with European Union sanctions.】

item.title: 德意志银行正在失去杠杆融资交易的优势
item.description: 当德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）试图为一家收购两家博彩公司的私募股权公司出售 43 亿美元的债务时，投资者并不看好。【原文：When Deutsche Bank AG tried to sell $4.3 billion in debt for a private equity firm buying two gambling companies, investors weren’t enthused.】

item.title: 石油交易商认为欧佩克+将通过新一轮增产完成供应复兴
item.description: 石油交易商预计，欧佩克+将在本周末同意再次大幅增产，从而完成目前这批停止供应的恢复工作。【原文：Oil traders expect OPEC+ will agree another bumper production increase this weekend, completing the revival of its current tranche of halted supplies.】

item.title: PZU 保险公司希望为波兰大型项目提供种子基金
item.description: 波兰保险公司 PZU SA 计划在完成与北欧银行（Bank Pekao SA）的合并后，在为该国大额能源和基础设施项目吸引资金方面发挥关键作用。【原文：Polish insurer PZU SA envisages playing a key role in attracting financing for the country’s big-ticket energy and infrastructure projects after it completes a merger with Bank Pekao SA.】

item.title: 到 2029 年，德国国防开支将翻一番，达到 1,620 亿欧元
item.description: 德国计划在未来四年内将国防支出（包括对乌克兰的援助）增加一倍以上，达到1,620亿欧元（1,890亿美元），以此作为投资的一部分，重建其被忽视的军队，以应对俄罗斯在欧洲日益加剧的侵略。【原文：Germany plans to more than double its defense outlays — including Ukraine aid — to as much as €162 billion ($189 billion) over the next four years as part of an investment push to rebuild its neglected military in response to mounting Russian aggression in Europe.】

item.title: 摩根大通和 Robeco 在华尔街日常工作中悄然部署人工智能
item.description: 华尔街与人工智能的短暂调情已发展成为一种持久的纠葛；这种纠葛已开始影响战略的制定、风险的提示和资金的流动。【原文：Wall Street’s brief flirtation with AI has grown into a lasting entanglement — one that’s starting to influence how strategies are built, risks are flagged, and money moves.】

item.title: 英伟达支持的 Cohere 与电信公司 BCE 结成人工智能联盟
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 Cohere Inc. 达成一项协议，将其人工智能模型整合到加拿大最大的电信公司 BCE Inc.【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Cohere Inc. struck a deal to integrate its AI models into services provided by BCE Inc., Canada’s largest telecommunications firm by revenue.】

item.title: 中美两国在推动人工智能蓬勃发展的战略上存在分歧
item.description:
华盛顿为数据中心提供燃料的计划依赖于化石燃料，而北京则认为这是一条更清洁的道路。【原文：

Washington’s plans for feeding data centers rely on fossil fuels, while Beijing sees a cleaner path.

】

item.title: 俄罗斯国际航空公司计算机系统遭黑客攻击后取消数十个航班
item.description: 俄罗斯对针对俄罗斯国际航空公司（Aeroflot PJSC）信息系统的黑客攻击展开刑事调查，该攻击导致该航空公司周一数十个航班被取消或延误。【原文：Russia opened a criminal investigation into a hacking attack against Aeroflot PJSC’s information systems that resulted in dozens of the airline’s flights being canceled or delayed on Monday.】

item.title: 太阳王赢得花旗银行支持的贷款，促进肯尼亚太阳能发电的普及
item.description: 全球最大的离网太阳能公司 Sun King 在花旗集团和英国国际投资公司的支持下获得了 1.56 亿美元的融资，用于在肯尼亚全国推广可负担得起的太阳能发电。【原文：Sun King, the world’s largest off-grid solar company, has secured $156 million in financing backed by Citigroup Inc. and British International Investment to boost access to affordable solar power across Kenya.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数反弹面临 11 万亿美元的大型科技公司财报考验
item.description: 本周，S&P 500 指数不断创新高的势头将面临严峻考验，四家总价值达 11.3 万亿美元的科技巨头将在两天内公布财报。【原文：The S&P 500 Index’s relentless advance to record highs faces a crucial test this week, with four technology behemoths worth a combined $11.3 trillion reporting earnings over a two-day stretch.】

item.title: 世界银行总裁称津巴布韦需要二十国集团的帮助以摆脱债务陷阱
item.description: 世界银行行长阿贾伊-班加（Ajay Banga）说，津巴布韦摆脱长达 25 年债务违约的最佳机会是让 20 国集团帮助制定解决方案，而不是试图自己走出泥潭。【原文：Zimbabwe’s best chance of exiting a 25-year debt default is to engage the Group of 20 nations to help formulate a solution and stop trying to work its way out of the quagmire itself, World Bank President Ajay Banga said.】

item.title: Qube 将把两家对冲基金合并成价值超过 200 亿美元的基金池
item.description: Qube Research & Technologies 正在将其最大的两个对冲基金合并为一个资金池，资产超过 200 亿美元。【原文：Qube Research & Technologies is merging two of its largest hedge funds into one money pool with more than $20 billion in assets.】

item.title: 印尼希望通过刺激计划和降息来确保 5% 的经济增长
item.description: 印尼承诺将动用财政和货币力量，确保今年的经济增长速度保持在 5%。【原文：Indonesia pledged to use its fiscal and monetary firepower to ensure economic growth maintains its 5% pace this year.】

item.title: 特朗普人工智能峰会将目标锁定在硬件上，认为这是美国称霸的关键所在
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，埃德-鲁德洛（Ed Ludlow）将报道特朗普政府新的人工智能行动计划的影响。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ed Ludlow reports on the implications of the Trump administration’s new AI Action Plan.】

item.title: 立法者希望智利摆脱资本市场中坚力量的束缚
item.description: 经过近 60 年的发展，智利的立法者们正在讨论是否到了限制使用与通货膨胀挂钩的会计单位的时候了。【原文：After almost 60 years, Chilean lawmakers are debating whether the time has come to restrict the use of an inflation-linked accounting unit that has come to dominate the country’s financial transactions.】

item.title: 如果银行估值居高不下，阿班卡可能考虑进行首次公开募股
item.description: Abanca Corporacion Bancaria SA 表示，如果银行股的较高估值被证明是可持续的，那么从长远来看，该公司可能会考虑首次公开募股。【原文：Abanca Corporacion Bancaria SA said it may consider an initial public offering in the longer term if higher valuations for bank stocks prove sustainable.】

item.title: Transnet 债券因南非提供 53 亿美元担保而跳涨
item.description: 在南非政府批准数十亿美元的担保，进一步支持这家债务缠身的国有铁路和港口运营商之后，Transnet SOC Ltd. 的债券大涨。【原文：Transnet SOC Ltd.’s bonds rallied after South Africa’s government approved billions of dollars in guarantees to further support the debt-laden state-owned rail and port operator.】

item.title: 特姆公司因非法销售产品受到欧盟更严格的审查
item.description: 欧盟加大了对中国电子商务公司特姆公司的调查力度，称该公司未能评估有多少非法产品通过其平台销售。【原文：The European Union ramped up an investigation into Chinese-owned e-commerce firm Temu, saying that the company fails to gauge how many illegal products are sold through its platform.】

item.title: 印度警告特朗普关税和全球经济放缓带来的贸易风险
item.description: 南亚国家印度财政部表示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关税政策的持续不确定性，印度未来几个季度的贸易表现可能会受到影响。【原文：India’s trade performance may suffer in the coming quarters due to the ongoing uncertainty over US President Donald Trump’s tariff policies, according to the South Asian nation’s finance ministry.】

item.title: 至关重要的一周拉开帷幕，股市呈现看涨基调
item.description:
美欧贸易协议提振股市，美联储和就业报告迫在眉睫。【原文：

US-EU trade deal lifts stocks as Fed, jobs report loom.

】
